### ReplaceCallWith() {#a97741acf9b0e38ab508c939d99e53767}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["static"]}>
This function is used when we want to lower an intrinsic call to a call of an external function.

This handles hard cases such as when there was already a prototype for the external function, but that prototype doesn&#39;t match the arguments we expect to pass in.

Definition at line <a href="#l00030">30</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/intrinsiclowering-cpp">IntrinsicLowering.cpp</a>.

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Emit the code to lower ctpop of V before the specified instruction IP.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148" lineLink="#ade8fbcac63ba4f738ae2de92a195becc"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="#ade8fbcac63ba4f738ae2de92a195becc">LowerCTPOP</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Context, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;IP) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(V-&gt;getType()-&gt;isIntegerTy() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Can&#39;t ctpop a non-integer type!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t MaskValues&#91;6&#93; = &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    0x5555555555555555ULL, 0x3333333333333333ULL,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">    0x0F0F0F0F0F0F0F0FULL, 0x00FF00FF00FF00FFULL,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">    0x0000FFFF0000FFFFULL, 0x00000000FFFFFFFFULL</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> Builder(IP);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BitSize = V-&gt;getType()-&gt;getPrimitiveSizeInBits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WordSize = (BitSize + 63) / 64;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> = ConstantInt::get(V-&gt;getType(), 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> n = 0; n &lt; WordSize; ++n) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;PartValue = V;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 1, ct = 0; i &lt; (BitSize&gt;64 ? 64 : BitSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">         i &lt;&lt;= 1, ++ct) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;MaskCst = ConstantInt::get(V-&gt;getType(), MaskValues&#91;ct&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a> = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aa4f2cec52a8e17a4c72319334fbef771">CreateAnd</a>(PartValue, MaskCst, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;cppop.and1&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;VShift = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a5849d19e500f8c6713ec44889058f424">CreateLShr</a>(PartValue,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">                                        ConstantInt::get(V-&gt;getType(), i),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">                                         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;ctpop.sh&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a> = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aa4f2cec52a8e17a4c72319334fbef771">CreateAnd</a>(VShift, MaskCst, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;cppop.and2&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">      PartValue = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aada1d6d8de104a5cd1cb9a02c676cc6c">CreateAdd</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;ctpop.step&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aada1d6d8de104a5cd1cb9a02c676cc6c">CreateAdd</a>(PartValue, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;ctpop.part&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BitSize &gt; 64) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">      V = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a5849d19e500f8c6713ec44889058f424">CreateLShr</a>(V, ConstantInt::get(V-&gt;getType(), 64),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;ctpop.part.sh&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">      BitSize -= 64;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
